ch.ethz.dcg.jukefox.playmode
Interface IPlayMode

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasePlayMode, ContextShufflePlayMode, MagicPlayMode, PlayOncePlayMode, RandomShufflePlayMode, RepeatAllPlayMode, RepeatSongPlayMode, ShufflePlaylistPlayMode, SimilarPlayMode, SmartShufflePlayMode
public interface IPlayMode

Method Summary
 PlayModeType getPlayModeType()
          Returns the type of the playmode.
 PlayerControllerCommands initialize(IReadOnlyPlaylist currentPlaylist)
          Return the actions that have to be taken upon intialization of the play mode
 PlayerControllerCommands next(boolean skipped, IReadOnlyPlaylist currentPlaylist)
          Returns the actions that have to be taken if the current song has ended or when it was skipped.
 PlayerControllerCommands previous(IReadOnlyPlaylist currentPlaylist)
          Returns the playlist changes which are necessary to get to the previous song
 void reset()
          Resets the playmode
 

Method Detail

initialize

PlayerControllerCommands initialize(IReadOnlyPlaylist currentPlaylist)
Return the actions that have to be taken upon intialization of the play mode

Returns:
the Commands that should be executed upon the initialization of the play mode;

reset

void reset()
Resets the playmode

next

PlayerControllerCommands next(boolean skipped,
                              IReadOnlyPlaylist currentPlaylist)
                              throws NoNextSongException
Returns the actions that have to be taken if the current song has ended or when it was skipped. Calling this method does not change the state of the play mode.

Parameters:
skipped - true if the song ended if it was skipped, false if it was listened to the end
currentPlaylist - the playlist on which the play moe works
Throws:
NoNextSongException

previous

PlayerControllerCommands previous(IReadOnlyPlaylist currentPlaylist)
                                  throws NoNextSongException
Returns the playlist changes which are necessary to get to the previous song

Throws:
NoNextSongException

getPlayModeType

PlayModeType getPlayModeType()
Returns the type of the playmode.
